languages.text: "Л-лорд-капитан?" {n}Болезненное, взволнованное лицо Кассии стало, кажется, еще бледнее.{/n} "Конец нашего пути уже близок. Я все думаю... будет ли это история со счастливым финалом? Или же нас ждет неминуемая, но героическая смерть..."

"L-Lord Captain?" {n}Cassia's pained, worried face seems to grow even paler.{/n} "The end of our journey draws near. I keep wondering... will this story have a happy ending? Or will we face an imminent but heroic demise..."
languages.original_text: "Л-лорд-капитан?" {n}Болезненное, взволнованное лицо Кассии стало, кажется, еще бледнее.{/n} "Конец нашего пути уже близок. Я все думаю... будет ли это история со счастливым финалом? Или же нас ждет неминуемая, но героическая смерть..."

"L-Lord Captain?" {n}Cassia's pained, worried face seems to grow even paler.{/n} "The end of our journey draws near. I keep wondering... will this story have a happy ending? Or will we face an imminent but heroic demise..."

languages.text: “舰、舰长大人？”{n}卡西娅的脸庞充满痛苦与忧虑，似乎比平时更加苍白。{/n}“我们的旅程即将结束。我一直在想……这个故事会迎来圆满的结局吗？还是说，我们会像烈士一样，即将面临壮烈的死亡……”
languages.original_text: "L-Lord Captain?" {n}Cassia's pained, worried face seems to grow even paler.{/n} "The end of our journey draws near. I keep wondering... will this story have a happy ending? Or will we face an imminent but heroic demise..."

traits.locale_text: “舰、舰长大人？”{n}卡西娅的脸庞充满痛苦与忧虑，似乎比平时更加苍白。{/n}“我们的旅程即将结束。我一直在想……这个故事会迎来圆满的结局吗？还是说，我们会像烈士一样，即将面临壮烈的死亡……”

languages.text: «¿L-Lord Capitán?». {n}El rostro dolorido y preocupado de Cassia parece palidecer aún más.{/n} «Se aproxima el final de nuestro viaje. No dejo de preguntarme si esta historia tendrá un final feliz... o si nos enfrentaremos a una muerte inminente, aunque heroica...».
languages.original_text: "L-Lord Captain?" {n}Cassia's pained, worried face seems to grow even paler.{/n} "The end of our journey draws near. I keep wondering... will this story have a happy ending? Or will we face an imminent but heroic demise..."

traits.locale_text: «¿L-Lord Capitán?». {n}El rostro dolorido y preocupado de Cassia parece palidecer aún más.{/n} «Se aproxima el final de nuestro viaje. No dejo de preguntarme si esta historia tendrá un final feliz... o si nos enfrentaremos a una muerte inminente, aunque heroica...».

languages.text: 「ロ、ロード・キャプテン？」{n}カシアの苦しげな、案ずるような顔がさらに青ざめたように見える。{/n}「旅の終わりが近づいております。考えずにはいられないのです…この物語はハッピーエンドになるのかしら？それとも…目前まで迫りつつ、英雄のような終焉を迎えることになるのでしょうか…」
languages.original_text: "L-Lord Captain?" {n}Cassia's pained, worried face seems to grow even paler.{/n} "The end of our journey draws near. I keep wondering... will this story have a happy ending? Or will we face an imminent but heroic demise..."

traits.locale_text: 「ロ、ロード・キャプテン？」{n}カシアの苦しげな、案ずるような顔がさらに青ざめたように見える。{/n}「旅の終わりが近づいております。考えずにはいられないのです…この物語はハッピーエンドになるのかしら？それとも…目前まで迫りつつ、英雄のような終焉を迎えることになるのでしょうか…」

languages.text: "L-Lord Captain?" {n}Cassias gequältes, besorgtes Gesicht scheint noch blasser zu werden.{/n} "Das Ende unserer Reise naht. Ich frage mich laufend ... wird diese Geschichte ein glückliches Ende haben? Oder werden wir einen baldigen, aber heldenhaften Tod finden ..."
languages.original_text: "L-Lord Captain?" {n}Cassia's pained, worried face seems to grow even paler.{/n} "The end of our journey draws near. I keep wondering... will this story have a happy ending? Or will we face an imminent but heroic demise..."

traits.locale_text: "L-Lord Captain?" {n}Cassias gequältes, besorgtes Gesicht scheint noch blasser zu werden.{/n} "Das Ende unserer Reise naht. Ich frage mich laufend ... wird diese Geschichte ein glückliches Ende haben? Oder werden wir einen baldigen, aber heldenhaften Tod finden ..."

languages.text: « {mf|S-Seigneur-capitaine|S-Seigneure-capitaine} ? » {n}Les traits dolents et empreints d'inquiétude de Cassia pâlissent encore d'un ton.{/n} « La fin de notre périple approche, et cette question me trotte dans la tête en permanence... Notre histoire connaîtra-t-elle une fin heureuse ? Ou sommes-nous {mf|promis|promises} à une mort aussi imminente qu'héroïque ? »
languages.original_text: "L-Lord Captain?" {n}Cassia's pained, worried face seems to grow even paler.{/n} "The end of our journey draws near. I keep wondering... will this story have a happy ending? Or will we face an imminent but heroic demise..."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|S-Seigneur-capitaine|S-Seigneure-capitaine} ? » {n}Les traits dolents et empreints d'inquiétude de Cassia pâlissent encore d'un ton.{/n} « La fin de notre périple approche, et cette question me trotte dans la tête en permanence... Notre histoire connaîtra-t-elle une fin heureuse ? Ou sommes-nous {mf|promis|promises} à une mort aussi imminente qu'héroïque ? »

languages.text: "L... Lord Kaptan?" {n}Cassia'nın acılı ve endişeli yüzü iyice soluyor.{/n} "Yolculuğumuzun sonu yaklaştı. Merak etmeden edemiyorum... Bu hikâyenin mutlu bir sonu olacak mı? Yoksa çok yakında kahramanca bir şekilde ecelimize mi kavuşacağız?"
languages.original_text: "L-Lord Captain?" {n}Cassia's pained, worried face seems to grow even paler.{/n} "The end of our journey draws near. I keep wondering... will this story have a happy ending? Or will we face an imminent but heroic demise..."
